title: 6.0 rc4 - delete .odt-files doesnt work correctly
body:
### expected behaviour
deleted .odt-file should be shown in the trashbin

### actual behaviour
the deleted .odt-file is not shown in the trashbin

### steps to reproduce
1. upload (or create with the document app) an .odt-file
2. delete this .odt-file
3. look in the trashbin, there ist no .odt-file

### server configuration
operating system:
debian sid

web server: 
nginx

database:
postgresql

php version:
5.5.6

owncloud version:
6.0 rc4 (upstream tar.bz2, its not the package from the debian repo)

updated from an older owncloud or fresh install:
fresh install

apps:
encryption app ist activated


### logs
#### web server error log

owncloud.log

{"app":"hook","message":"error while running hook (oca\\files_trashbin\\hooks::remove_hook): an exception occurred while executing 'insert into \"oc_files_trash\" (\"id\",\"timestamp\",\"location\",\"type\",\"mime\",\"user\") values (?,?,?,?,?,?)':\n\nsqlstate[22001]: string data, right truncated: 7 fehler:  wert zu lang f\u00fcr typ character varying(30)","level":3,"time":"2013-12-08t08:42:02+01:00"}


dont sure if this ist related, there ist also this entry

{"app":"php","message":"filemtime(): stat failed for \/media\/cloud\/owncloud\/data\/andre\/files_trashbin\/files at \/media\/cloud\/owncloud\/lib\/private\/files\/storage\/local.php#127","level":2,"time":"2013-12-08t07:52:11+01:00"}



postgresql.log

2013-12-08 08:42:02 cet fehler:  wert zu lang fã¼r typ character varying(30)
2013-12-08 08:42:02 cet anweisung:  insert into "oc_files_trash" ("id","timestamp","location","type","mime","user") values ($1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6)
